body.p: 1. One of David’s valiant warriors, called a Paltite in 2 Samuel 23:26 and a Pelonite in 1 Chronicles 11:27. The former is probably correct and refers to a person from Bethpelet. Most scholars think he is the same man as the officer in charge of the seventh course during David’s reign (1 Chr 27:10).
2. Jerahmeel’s descendant from Judah’s tribe (1 Chr 2:39).
